从2020年纽约之夜开始，香港CÉ LA VI已经关闭。

 

香港CÉ LA VI是一个很大的地方，横跨三层楼，位于香港中部流行的夜生活区兰桂坊。在这里，你可以找到一个现代日本风格的室内餐厅，以及俱乐部休息室和屋顶酒吧，名为Sky Deck。

 

2018年夏天，为了庆祝CÉ LA VI三周年，Sky Deck露台进行了整修，现在比以前更加时尚了，有拉丝铜的细节和许多舒适的休闲沙发。

 

然而，这里的景色却完全一样，可以看到香港的天际线、周围的山脉和维多利亚港的270度全景。除了宏伟的景色之外，CÉ LA VI屋顶酒吧还非常注重气氛。

 

虽然Sky Deck每天都开放，但周三至周六也意味着俱乐部酒廊的开放，然后这就是城市中最热门的夜生活目的地之一。从周三的 "女士之夜 "开始，现场DJ和时髦的人群使整个周末的气氛都很热烈。

 

屋顶酒吧提供梦幻般的招牌鸡尾酒，以及美味的亚洲风味的酒吧小吃。因此，你可以在餐厅里美美地享用一番，然后在露台上喝上一杯，或者你也可以只吃点东西，让你的胃很舒服。

 

记住在参观时要穿得漂亮点（不要穿短裤，先生们），因为CÉ LA VI的着装要求相当严格。在工作日的下午3点至9点之间来这里享受欢乐时光，欣赏香港的日落和精致的鸡尾酒。如果是在晚间来访，一定要带着你最好的派对心情。
contentEn:
As of NYE 2020, CÉ LA VI Hong Kong is closed.

 

CÉ LA VI Hong Kong is a large place, spanning over three floors above the popular nigthlife area Lan Kwai Fong in Hong Kong Central. Up here you find both a modern Japanese-inspired indoor restaurant, along with Club Lounge and rooftop bar, named Sky Deck.

 

The Sky Deck terrace had a refurbishment during summer 2018 for the CÉ LA VI 3rd anniversary, and is now even more stylish then before. Modern and sleek, with details in brushed copper and lots of comfy lounge sofas.

 

The view is however exactly the same, with sweeping 270-degree views of the Hong Kong skyline, the surrounding mountains and Victoria Harbor. Apart from the grand views, the CÉ LA VI rooftop bar is alot about atmosphere.

 

While the Sky Deck is open daily, Wed-Sat also means opening of the Club Lounge and then this is one of the hottest nightlife destinations in the city. Starting of with 'Ladies Nights'on Wednesday, live DJs and a trendy crowd keep the vibe high throughout the weekend.

 

The rooftop bar serves fantastic crafted signature cocktails, along with delicious Asian-inspired bar bites. So you can either do a combo of full meal at the great reastaurant and top of with drinks on the terrace, or you can actually keep the stomach quite happy just with the bites.

 

Remember to dress to impress when visiting (no shorts gentlemen), since the CÉ LA VI dress code is quite strict. Come here between 3-9pm on weekdays for happy hour, sunset over Hong Kong and sophisticated cocktails. For visits later at night, make sure to bring your very best party mood.
